name: Blots!
description:
Puzzle game with rogue-like movement where you control more than one character at the same time

Controls:

  • Arrows - Movement
  • R - Restart

Entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, didn't have time to upload it in time, but here it is,  the theme was "joined together" here we are in control of various characters where their movement is joined, there are 10 levels.

Music from: Here
